content: It is crucial to recognize that the perspective of glorifying white supremacy may be rooted in a history of exclusion and discrimination, and some individuals may not be aware of the full impact and symbolism of monuments such as Mount Rushmore. Advocating for a more inclusive and diverse representation of history involves recognizing these underlying dynamics and engaging in conversations that strive towards mutual understanding and respect. It is through these efforts that we can work towards building a more equitable society that values and uplifts the experiences and contributions of all communities.
